history.ai_response: Hey there!  So cool to chat with you.  AI is just fascinating, isn't it?  What's *your* first thought or feeling when you hear the word "AI"?

Hey!  Innovation is a fantastic first thought about AI!  I get that.  For me, it's a mix of excitement and a little bit of... well, wonder.  What kind of innovations are you most excited about with AI?
